messages.title: BRING BACK OUR A&E
messages.content: We have a great hospital in Bishop Auckland, but many services are only available in Durham or Darlington. The NHS is getting record investment under this Government, so I'll fight to get a share of that to bring back our A&E.

messages.title: REVITALISE OUR HIGH STREETS
messages.content: Bishop and Spennymoor need our help. The Government’s Town Fund will see us get up to £25 million in Bishop. I will form a plan so we can make the most of the investment, and will campaign for the next round to come into Spennymoor.

messages.title: GET OUR YOUNG PEOPLE INTO WORK
messages.content: Jobs fairs help our young people get into work and discover exciting new career opportunities. I’ll work with local businesses to hold jobs fairs every three months to help connect up employers with young people looking for new jobs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a share of Government NHS investment to bring A&E services back to Bishop Auckland Hospital.
Leverage Government’s Town Fund to get up to £25 million for Bishop and campaign for further investment in Spennymoor.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Our Young People Into Work
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Organize jobs fairs every three months to connect employers with young job seekers, working with local businesses.
